test.doc: During test, various Fails would be occurred. Script developer can highlight important fail message at Runner's 'TestInProgressing' > Message by using 'Run Keyword And Highlight Fail Message' keyword. (Ex: Distinguish between judgement fail and environment fail(connection fail, navigation fail, etc...) http://wiki.vd.sec.samsung.net/display/BTS/Leave+a+message+on+the+TestInProgressing
test.status: [Problem]HighlightFailMessageNo keyword with name 'Should Be Same' found.
